com.nutiteq.layers.raster.deprecated

Class MBTilesMapLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.layers.Layer
      • com.nutiteq.rasterlayers.RasterLayer
        • com.nutiteq.layers.raster.deprecated.MBTilesMapLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UtfGridLayerInterface
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class MBTilesMapLayer
extends com.nutiteq.rasterlayers.RasterLayer
implements UtfGridLayerInterface
    A raster layer class for reading map tiles from local Sqlite database. The database must contain table tiles with the following fields:

    zoom_level (zoom level of the tile), tile_column, tile_row, tile_data (compressed tile bitmap)

    • Constructor Detail

      • MBTilesMapLayer

        public MBTilesMapLayer(com.nutiteq.projections.Projection projection,
               int minZoom,
               int maxZoom,
               int id,
               String path,
               android.content.Context ctx)
                throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        projection - projection for the layer.
        minZoom - minimum zoom supported by the layer.
        maxZoom - maximum zoom supported by the layer.
        id - unique layer id. Id for the layer must be depend ONLY on the layer source, otherwise tile caching will not work properly.
        path - path to the local Sqlite database file. SQLiteException will be thrown if the database does not exist or can not be opened in read-only mode.
        ctx - Android application context.
        Throws:
        IOException - exception if file not exists

        public void close()
        Deprecated. 
        Close database file. After calling this, new tiles will not be read from the database.
